price: Nítorí náà, ṣé wọ́n tún ń retí (n̄ǹkan mìíràn) ni bí kò ṣe (ìparun) irú ti ọjọ́ àwọn tó ré kọjá lọ ṣíwájú wọn. Sọ pé: “Ẹ máa retí nígbà náà. Dájúdájú èmi náà wà pẹ̀lú yín nínú àwọn olùretí.”
arabic: فَهَلۡ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fahal yantaẓirūna illā mith'la ayyāmi alladhīna khalaw min qablihim qul fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
